From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin explōrāre. First attested in 1495.[1]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [əks.pluˈɾa]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [əks.ploˈɾa]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [eks.ploˈɾaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ), -a
  • Hyphenation: ex‧plo‧rar
  • Homophone: explorà (except Valencian)

Verb

[edit]

explorar (first-person singular present exploro, first-person singular preterite explorí, past participle explorat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /o/

  1. to explore

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explorar (first conjugation)
infinitive explorar
gerund explorant
past participle masculine feminine
singular explorat explorada
plural explorats explorades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present exploro explores explora explorem exploreu exploren
imperfect explorava exploraves explorava exploràvem exploràveu exploraven
future exploraré exploraràs explorarà explorarem explorareu exploraran
preterite explorí explorares explorà exploràrem exploràreu exploraren
conditional exploraria exploraries exploraria exploraríem exploraríeu explorarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present explori exploris explori explorem exploreu explorin
imperfect explorés exploressis explorés exploréssim exploréssiu exploressin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — explora explori explorem exploreu explorin
negative (no) — no exploris no explori no explorem no exploreu no explorin

Related terms

[edit]
  • exploració
  • explorador

References

[edit]
  1. ^ “explorar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025

Further reading

[edit]
  • “explorar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “explorar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “explorar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /eksplɔˈɾaɾ/ [eks̺.plɔˈɾaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Hyphenation: ex‧plo‧rar

Verb

[edit]

explorar (first-person singular present exploro, first-person singular preterite explorei, past participle explorado)

  1. to explore

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explorar

(ti) 		Third-person

Related terms

[edit]

[edit]

  • “explorar”, in Dicionário Estraviz de galego (in Galician), 2014–2025

Occitan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin explorāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

explorar

  1. (transitive) to explore

Conjugation

[edit]
    Lengadocian (Central Occitan)
simple compound
infinitive explorar aver explorat
gerund explorant use gerund of aver + past participle
past participle explorat —
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative ieu tu el nosautres vosautres eles

conditional explorariái explorariás explorariá explorariam explorariatz explorarián

tenses 		present perfect use the present tense of aver + past participle
pluperfect use the imperfect tense of aver + past participle

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Learned borrowing from Latin explōrāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /is.ploˈɾa(ʁ)/ [is.ploˈɾa(h)], /es.ploˈɾa(ʁ)/ [es.ploˈɾa(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /is.ploˈɾa(ʁ)/ [is.ploˈɾa(h)], /es.ploˈɾa(ʁ)/ [es.ploˈɾa(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /is.ploˈɾa(ɾ)/, /es.ploˈɾa(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /iʃ.ploˈɾa(ʁ)/ [iʃ.ploˈɾa(χ)], /eʃ.ploˈɾa(ʁ)/ [eʃ.ploˈɾa(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /es.ploˈɾa(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/, /ɐjʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/, /ɐjʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/
    • (Northern Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/, /ejʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/
    • (Central Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/, /ejʃ.pluˈɾaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pluˈɾa.ɾi/, /eʃ.pluˈɾa.ɾi/

Verb

[edit]

explorar (first-person singular present exploro, first-person singular preterite explorei, past participle explorado)

  1. to explore
  2. to exploit
  3. to discover
  4. to research

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explorar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal explorar
Personal explorar explorares explorar explorarmos explorardes explorarem
Gerund
explorando
Past participle
Masculine explorado explorados
Feminine explorada exploradas
Indicative
Present exploro exploras explora exploramos explorais exploram
Imperfect explorava exploravas explorava explorávamos exploráveis exploravam
Preterite explorei exploraste explorou exploramos1, explorámos2 explorastes exploraram
Pluperfect explorara exploraras explorara exploráramos exploráreis exploraram
Future explorarei explorarás explorará exploraremos explorareis explorarão
Conditional exploraria explorarias exploraria exploraríamos exploraríeis explorariam
Subjunctive
Present explore explores explore exploremos exploreis explorem
Imperfect explorasse explorasses explorasse explorássemos explorásseis explorassem
Future explorar explorares explorar explorarmos explorardes explorarem
Imperative
Affirmative explora explore exploremos explorai explorem
Negative (não) não explores não explore não exploremos não exploreis não explorem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Related terms

[edit]
  • exploração
  • explorador

Further reading

[edit]
  • “explorar”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin explorāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /eɡsploˈɾaɾ/ [eɣ̞s.ploˈɾaɾ]
  • IPA(key): (informal) /esploˈɾaɾ/ [es.ploˈɾaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: ex‧plo‧rar

Verb

[edit]

explorar (first-person singular present exploro, first-person singular preterite exploré, past participle explorado)

  1. to explore

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explorar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive explorar
gerund explorando
past participle masculine feminine
singular explorado explorada
plural explorados exploradas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present exploro explorastú
explorásvos 		explora exploramos exploráis exploran
imperfect exploraba explorabas exploraba explorábamos explorabais exploraban
preterite exploré exploraste exploró exploramos explorasteis exploraron
future exploraré explorarás explorará exploraremos exploraréis explorarán
conditional exploraría explorarías exploraría exploraríamos exploraríais explorarían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present explore explorestú
explorésvos2 		explore exploremos exploréis exploren
imperfect
(ra) 		explorara exploraras explorara exploráramos explorarais exploraran
imperfect
(se) 		explorase explorases explorase explorásemos exploraseis explorasen
future1 explorare explorares explorare exploráremos explorareis exploraren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative exploratú
explorávos 		explore exploremos explorad exploren
negative no explores no explore no exploremos no exploréis no exploren

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
